com.upsight.android.managedvariables.internal.type

Class UxmSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.managedvariables.internal.type.UxmSchema

  • public final class UxmSchema
extends java.lang.Object
    The UXM schema that defines schemas for all managed variables.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UxmSchema.BaseSchema<T>
      The base schema extended by all managed variable schemas.
      static class  UxmSchema.BooleanSchema
      Managed variable schema representing a Boolean.
      static class  UxmSchema.FloatSchema
      Managed variable schema representing a Float.
      static class  UxmSchema.IntSchema
      Managed variable schema representing a Integer.
      static class  UxmSchema.StringSchema
      Managed variable schema representing a String.

               ObjectMapper mapper,
               UpsightLogger logger)
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an instance of the UxmSchema.
        Parameters:
        uxmSchemaString - The string representation of the schema in JSON.
        mapper - The ObjectMapper.
        logger - The UpsightLogger.
        Returns:
        The UxmSchema.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the input string is invalid.

      • getAllOrdered

        public java.util.List<UxmSchema.BaseSchema> getAllOrdered()
        Gets the list of UxmSchema.BaseSchema for each tag in the order as they are defined in the schema JSON.
        Returns:
        The list of UxmSchema.BaseSchema.

      • get

        public <T extends ManagedVariable> UxmSchema.BaseSchema get(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                   java.lang.String tag)
        Gets the schema by the tag of the managed variable.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A subtype of ManagedVariable.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The managed variable type.
        tag - The managed variable tag.
        Returns:
        The schema for the managed variable with the given tag; or null if the tag does not exist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The tag is not of the expected class.
